pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Microsoft Azure SDK for PythonThis is the Microsoft Azure Security Services namespace package.This package is not intended to be installed directly by the end user.Since version 3.0, this is Python 2 package only, Python 3.x SDKs will use `PEP420 <https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0420/>` as namespace package strategy.It provides the necessary files for other packages to extend the azure.security namespace.![Impressions](https://azure-sdk-impressions.azurewebsites.net/api/impressions/azure-sdk-for-python%2Fsdk%2Fsecurity%2Fazure-security-nspkg%2FREADME.png)
